recipes.title: Vegetarian Lasagna
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Layer the noodles with ricotta cheese, spinach, mozzarella, and tomato sauce. Bake for 40 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in a large pan and cook onions and garlic until soft. Add chicken and cook until browned. Stir in curry powder, coconut milk, and tomatoes. Simmer for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cake
recipes.instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F. Mix all ingredients in a bowl and pour into a greased cake tin. Bake for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegan Tacos
recipes.instructions: Fill taco shells with black beans, corn, lettuce, tomatoes, and vegan cheese. Serve with a side of salsa.

recipes.title: Chicken-Biryani
recipes.instructions: Fill taco shells with black beans, corn, lettuce, tomatoes, and vegan cheese. Serve with a side of salsa.
